title: Window.name via Eval
description: Demonstrates a high-risk DOM-based XSS through window.name and eval().
objectives: Understand how window.name can be manipulated to carry payloads.
Identify unsafe eval usage on window.name.
Trigger the execution without query parameters or forms.
hints: You can set window.name in another tab or via a link.
Eval will execute the value in window.name.
